A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I love Star Wars\, Empire and Jedi because they communicated a universal story in an incredible universe. That story tight\, economically told\, and had a sense of inevitability. The Last Jedi takes place in the same universe\, and beyond that\, is the exact opposite. I am glad to see women and as diverse a cast as possible in this or any film. The problem I have with this film is that it is deeply boring\, and that is because it lacks a strong story and strong characters. Strong is a vague word - but fundamentally\, the success of the original films was anchored in believability and emotion.
